channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：欧佩克+成员国同意将石油自愿减产协议延长至第二季度末，基本符合市场预期，同时俄罗斯承诺削减产量和出口，油价随之走高
item.description:
WATCH: Oil prices nudged higher after OPEC+ members agreed to extend voluntary oil output cuts to the end of the second quarter, largely in line with market expectations, while Russia pledged to cut production and exports https://t.co/vtbJfHFDR1 pic.twitter.com/kBGmsJdKKt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 荷兰养老基金 ABP 的目标是到 2030 年实现 325 亿美元的 "影响力 "投资
item.description:
Dutch pension fund ABP aims for $32.5 bln in 'impact' investments by 2030 https://t.co/M3GkStAvDH pic.twitter.com/wl1EFz7SlC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将于周四召开会议，随着通胀率的走低，市场将密切关注降息的动向。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The European Central Bank meets on Thursday, with markets eyeing any nudge towards an interest rate cut as inflation weakens. More here: https://t.co/fyyam2xOew

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 瑞士国家银行年度亏损 36 亿美元
item.description:
Swiss National Bank posts annual loss of $3.6 billion https://t.co/lhG0MsYeQ7 pic.twitter.com/ZlvLxfu0MZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 德国化工集团赢创（Evonik）表示，预计2024年不会出现经济复苏迹象，并宣布到2026年将在全球范围内裁员多达2000人，以削减成本。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
German chemicals group Evonik said it expected no signs of a recovery in 2024 and announced up to 2,000 job cuts worldwide by 2026 in a bid to cut costs. More here: https://t.co/qZY5AOVL0e

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: SoftwareOne股东废除向贝恩出售公司的协议
item.description:
SoftwareOne shareholders scrap agreement to sell company to Bain https://t.co/CAZrwUIrXV pic.twitter.com/JlNn8zbcnC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 印度要求科技公司在公开发布 "不可靠 "或正在试用的人工智能工具之前，必须获得印度政府的批准，并指出这些工具还应该标明可能会为用户查询返回错误答案。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
India has asked tech firms to seek its approval before the public release of artificial intelligence tools that are ‘unreliable’ or under trial, noting they should also be labelled for the potential to return wrong answers for user queries. More here: https://t.co/MgcRP3YI7q

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：大众汽车电池部门的老板告诉 @路透社，在其工厂投入运营和统一电池单元投入使用之前，大众汽车不会考虑将其电池部门在股票市场上市，这基本上排除了在 2026 年之前上市的可能性。
item.description:
Exclusive: Volkswagen will not consider a stock market listing for its battery unit until its factories are up and running and its unified battery cell is in use, the division's boss told @Reuters, essentially ruling out a possible IPO before 2026 https://t.co/asu7uWqlBI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 随着科技股的飙升，日本主要股票基准首次突破 40,000 点。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Japan's main stock benchmark breached the 40,000-point level for the first time, as technology shares soared. More here: https://t.co/3Dh4zZGsEr pic.twitter.com/BgIZUCwwf1

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 4, 2024

item.title: 观看：在人工智能大潮的推动下，科技股创下历史新高，帮助美国股市收盘上涨
item.description:
WATCH: Record climbs by tech stocks on the back of an #AI surge helped US markets end higher https://t.co/qKNS8qKQw6 pic.twitter.com/4JoOJsu4Ll

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 2, 2024

item.title: 观看：从美国繁忙的一周到中国对新刺激政策的希望，这些都是未来几天商业和金融领域值得关注的故事
item.description:
WATCH: From a busy week in the US, to hopes for fresh stimulus in China, these are the stories to watch for in business and finance in the days ahead https://t.co/gtZsJUqIQR pic.twitter.com/5dEYYP6AtR

item.title: 戴尔公司的乐观预测进一步证明，人工智能应用的兴起正在推动企业技术供应商的收益，也为华尔街的狂热增添了一抹亮色。更多信息
item.description:
Dell’s upbeat forecast provides further evidence that rising #AI adoption is driving gains across enterprise technology vendors, and adds to the frenzy on Wall Street. Read more: https://t.co/qyhS44xelE pic.twitter.com/1Fx522HO6l

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 2, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国股市上涨，S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数创下收盘新高，原因是人工智能引领的另一波反弹提振了市场，而国债收益率下降则提供了进一步支撑
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks rose with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq notching closing highs, as another AI-led rally boosted markets, while a fall in Treasury yields provided further support https://t.co/qKNS8qKQw6 pic.twitter.com/t83OGYoGZ8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 2, 2024

item.title: 波音公司需要在 90 天内制定出解决质量控制问题的计划；索尼公司 PlayStation 游戏部门的裁员人数约为 900 人；法航-荷航股价暴跌超过 10%--即使该公司公布了创纪录的收入。本周数字及其他
item.description:
Boeing has 90 days to come up with a plan to tackle quality control issues; about 900 is how many jobs are going at Sony’s PlayStation gaming unit and over 10% was the plunge in shares for Air France-KLM - even as it posted record revenues. This and more in the Week in Numbers pic.twitter.com/MjhvD1ZxKG

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 2, 2024

item.title: 世贸组织文件草案称电子商务关税暂停期延长两年

Moratorium on e-commerce tariffs extended for 2 years, draft WTO document says https://t.co/UBGrRkwh4Q pic.twitter.com/7hCiO2blKW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：丽贝卡-克里斯蒂（Rebecca Christie）说，随着欧盟对核能的热情高涨，为了避免在小型核反应堆方面 "落后于形势"，欧洲投资银行的融资将发挥重要作用 #BVTV
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: For the European Union to avoid getting 'behind the curve' on small nuclear reactors, as it gets excited about nuclear power, European Investment Bank financing can make a difference, says Rebecca Christie #BVTV pic.twitter.com/1oeeOFKlx9

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 1, 2024
